guiTeacher.components

Class CustomImageButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiTeacher.components.Component
      • guiTeacher.components.StyledComponent
        • guiTeacher.components.TextLabel
          • guiTeacher.components.Button
            • guiTeacher.components.CustomImageButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clickable, TextComponent, Visible

    public class CustomImageButton
extends Button
    A Button with a customizable appearance. The constructor takes a "DrawInstructions" object as a parameter. Use this object to specify how the Buttons should be drawn.
    Author:
    bnockles

    • Method Detail

      • drawButton

        public void drawButton(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                       boolean hovered)
        Description copied from class: Button
        Called automatically by update. This method replaces the update(Graphics 2D) method and draw the Button. The hover parameter is used to distinguish between the Button when it is hovered and the Button when it is not being hovered
        Overrides:
        drawButton in class Button
